measurements_data.comments: 16; OD: Calculated assuming that 29.5 percent of all collected waste (88.4 percent) that is not recycled is dumped; SLF: Calculated based on  percent of people with collection service for this disposal method times the  percent of total collection coverage; RE: 13; UA: Refers to uncollected waste
